1.title: Jim Meet James

episode of.title: From Jim to James Crow (TV Series 2018â€“ )

1.plot: A look back into the roots of those who survived the Atlantic slave trade and how racism impacted those living then, and how it transitioned into the James Crow of today.

imdb.plot outline: From Jim to James Crow reflects the daily struggles of people of color and their allies across the U.S. The documentary dives deep beyond the mask POC put up in the public eye in order to make it through unscathed. Many Americans now are familiar with the coded language of the country's racial hegemony. While some shun certain words, others make anthems out of them. "Make America great again," is the new anthem while POC wonder when has America ever been great for them.
imdb.title: From Jim to James Crow
akas: From Jim to James Crow (United States)
plot: An in depth look at racial inequality in America today and how it transitioned from the nation's history of racism.::Omegia Keeys

_From Jim to James Crow_ (qv) reflects the daily struggles of people of color and their allies across the U.S. The documentary dives deep beyond the mask POC put up in the public eye in order to make it through unscathed. Many Americans now are familiar with the coded language of the country's racial hegemony. While some shun certain words, others make anthems out of them. "Make America great again," is the new anthem while POC wonder when has America ever been great for them.::Omegia Keeys
